channel.title: [Delta]Dialogues
channel.description:
Dear moparscapers,
I have a problem with the dialogues on my delta server. I am talking to a guy and some messages are showing up (so i mean talking, using case 1, 2...) Now when i am at the last dialogue i click on "click here to continue" Then there comes "please wait.." But it keeps at "please wait.." and it won't close. any help?
thanks in advance, halflive9

item.title: [Delta]Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote=“judostar1, post:4, topic:418272”][quote author=halflive9 link=topic=520818.msg3783679#msg3783679 date=1318689309]

do you have a return false or something exiting the dialogue?

No, you could check out the delta dialogue method. There’s nothing in it with return false.
[/quote]

add return false after all the dialogues, maybe that’ll help.[/quote]
Didn’t worked.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Dialogues
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

do you have a return false or something exiting the dialogue?
[/quote]
No, you could check out the delta dialogue method. There’s nothing in it with return false.[/quote]

add return false after all the dialogues, maybe that’ll help.

Read full topic
